greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A006047(A048673(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
program: return n + 1 if n<3 else reduce(mul, [1 + d[i] for i in range(1, len(d))])
return 1 if n==1 else (1 + reduce(mul, [nextprime(i)**f[i] for i in f]))//2
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 12 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 31 2017
